definition: to show respect from a distance (idiom)/to remain at a respectful distance
to respect/to venerate/to salute/to offer
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to distance oneself from (classical)
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
(possessive particle, literary equivalent of 的[de5])/him/her/it

sentences.english: There are also a few foods that I personally steer away from, like lunch meat.
sentences.chinese: 当然也有一些是我个人敬而远之的，比如午餐肉。

sentences.english: Many other countries and international organizations have begun to shy away from dam building.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家和国际组织都已开始对修建大坝敬而远之。

sentences.english: When you engage in informal conversation with your superiors, keep a respectful distance.
sentences.chinese: 当你和上司进行日常谈话的时候，要敬而远之。

sentences.english: Don't blow off non-CS classes just because they're boring.
sentences.chinese: 不要因为某些非计算机课程枯燥无趣就敬而远之。

sentences.english: The object of curious dent disorderly total being, can not mention the letter always returns not is reserve at a polite distance.
sentences.chinese: 怪力乱神的东西，不能说不信，总归是敬而远之。

sentences.english: Do you think predators are dangerous and need to be avoided?
sentences.chinese: 你是否觉得食肉动物非常危险，需敬而远之呢？

sentences.english: P.S – I still have issues eating ketchup.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然对番茄酱敬而远之。

sentences.english: I use it all the time at work. I try to stay away from it the rest of my life.
sentences.chinese: 工作时我离不开它，其余时间我尽量敬而远之。

sentences.english: Highly proffesional work by masters of art photography will hardly leave someone indifferent.
sentences.chinese: 艺术大师的高度专业作品一般都会让人敬而远之。

definition: to loathe/to hate/disgusted with sth
to detest bitterly (idiom)/implacable hatred/to abhor/anathema
to be disgusted with/to dislike/bad reaction/antipathy
to disgust/to pall/fed up/tedious/cloying/boring/irritating
to completely ignore (idiom)/to pay no attention to/not to be in the least concerned about
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
to treat sb favorably/to view in a new light
to snort disdainfully/to scoff at/to turn up one's nose
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
to dislike/to loathe/disagreeable/troublesome/annoying
to think of oneself as high and pure (idiom); smug and self-righteous/holier-than-thou
to reject/to exclude/to eliminate/to remove/to repel
to hate/to detest
to disdain as beneath contempt (idiom)
to honor sb as a God (idiom); to revere/to worship/to deify/to make a holy cow of sth/to put sb on a pedestal
to turn a blind eye to
